message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.CC, cs.CR 

Reasoning: The paper deals with the design and analysis of Local Reconstruction Codes (LRCs) for distributed storage systems, which involves topics related to information theory (cs.IT), data structures (cs.DS), distributed computing (cs.DC), coding theory (cs.CC), and cryptography (cs.CR). The paper presents lower bounds on the field size required for Maximally Recoverable (MR) LRCs and provides constructions for LRCs with few heavy parities, which are relevant to these sub-categories.
